EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.Name},
Your cards have shipped and you should receive them in 5-7 business days!
When you receive them you can give me a call if you need help getting set up online.
Our Speedway activation team will also be giving you a call to help you get set-up online,
and answer any other questions about using your cards so look out for another call from a 207 phone number.
Thank you so much for partnering with the Speedway Business Card Program!
Once you receive your cards you can manage your account online! You may opt out of paper statements and avoid a $10 paper statement charge, which is applied to encourage responsible paper usage.
Here is a tutorial that will help you navigate the online portal once you have created your online logins -
*******Take a look at this video with custom table of contents Tips & Tricks for your online portal ****************
Speedway Online Portal bookmark or save to your favorites and write down your username and password
You must enroll as a New User Once you enter all your info to create your New User, you will receive a confirmation email within a few minutes CHECK YOUR SPAM FILE for the confirmation email Once you receive this confirmation email, you will then go back online and create your actual password FOR HELP CALL - 866 544 5796 and ask for E-SERVICES. E-SERVICES will assist you in all things for your portal
Again, if you have any questions, call customer service 1-866-544-5796 and ask for E-SERVICES/online assistance.
If you ever have issues or too long a wait with customer service during the week please call me. I'm happy to help!
Make 2020 the Year to streamline and focus on your business growth and help others to do the same
Who do you know that owns or manages a business with company vehicles? Who do you know that is: a business owner, manager, bookkeeper, controller, fleet manager, driver, or traveling sales person?
We have some very valuable tools and additional resources and business services we can provide to them. If you refer anyone to me, I will be sure to take good care of them. Thank you for partnering your business with Speedway!
To Your Success,
Ehrika
